<\/p>

Overview<\/h2>

Qanga is an online BattleRoyal Sandbox Survival game in which you play as a Cyborg. They test you to repopulate the devastated lands of the planet ! Developed by iolaCorp<\/a> for PC<\/a><\/p>

<\/p>

System Requirements<\/h2>

PC<\/h3>
PC Minimum<\/th>PC Recommended<\/th><\/tr><\/thead>
  • CPU: i3 2.5 Ghz<\/li>
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM<\/li>
  • GPU: GTX 750ti<\/li>
  • SSD recommended.<\/li><\/ul><\/td>
  • CPU: i3 3.0 Ghz<\/li>
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM<\/li>
  • GPU: GTX 1050ti<\/li>
  • SSD recommended.<\/li><\/ul><\/td><\/tr><\/tbody><\/table>

      Empires in Ruins is a plot-driven strategy game where the player takes the grumpy Sergeant Hans Heimer in order to quell a rebellion, repel an enemy, and survive a conspiracy for power.<\/p>

      The game plays on two separate levels, the main\/campaign map, turn based 4X inspired, with social and military management, and the battles, 26 real time fights where Tower Defense and RTS mechanics merge for fast paced action.<\/p>

      In Direwolf, the players are given secret roles, and need to either eliminate all the evil characters (if they are on the town team) or eliminate all the good characters (if they are on the evil team)<\/p>

","description":"

      Platinum Kill is a fast-paced run and gun action game done in a pseudo retro style that blends nostalgia of classic games from this genre with more modern sensibilities of today\u2019s games, all while never taking itself too seriously. The enemies are plentiful, the mid-bosses occasional, and the end bosses huge and imposing (except for the cat boss, he\u2019s just
